text: "Say (All I Need)" is a song by pop rock band OneRepublic from their debut album Dreaming Out Loud. The song had a single release on 24 June 2008. It got a lot of high digital download sales after the album's release, and charted, meaning it may be the third single from the album. Category:OneRepublic songs Category:2008 songs
title: Say (All I Need)
